revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EAP300 |revision= |upc=655216005358 |ean= |asin=B005SSQHTM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/23/2011 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=U2M-EAP300 |ic_id=3616C-EAP300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/node/559 Product page on EnGenius Singapore]
[http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/files/pdf/EAP300.pdf Datasheet on EnGenius Singapore]
"7016A0510008" and "V-1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report mentions the EAP150 as being electrically identical.
*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31635-engenius-eap-300-80211-n-multi-function-access-point-reviewed Original review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31733-engenius-eap-300-retest retest with a later firmware]
The default SSID appears to be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC (capital letters).
==Images== <gallery> File:EnGenius EAP300.jpg File:EnGenius EAP300 2.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
